name: 楊雅婷
objective:
本文化生活美學發展專題課程因應主授教師專業背景及業界經驗，目標帶給同學們一同探索文化生活美學過程，展開如何開啟個人生涯規劃價值與事業發展助益之旅，並著重於與同學們一同了解及感悟文化生活美學過程，對個人事業及生活發展具有幫助，能於學習過程中發現與精煉個人美學天賦或美學智慧，並能將之創造並回饋應用於自己的事業及生活中，本課程將邀請文化生活美學典範人物分享與場域踏查體驗過程，帶領同學於過程中進行文化生活美學洞察，並能有機會具體應用於自己的生活及事業中。※本課程將因應典範人物分享或場域參訪調整授課內容或時間，主授教師將視師生學習進行最適配安排。

This special course on the development of cultural life aesthetics is based on the professional background and industry experience of the main teacher. The goal is to bring students to explore the process of cultural life aesthetics and how to start a journey of personal career planning value and career development assistance and focuses on working with students. Understand and appreciate the aesthetic process of cultural life together, which is helpful for personal career and life development. You can discover and refine your personal aesthetic talent or aesthetic wisdom in the learning process and be able to create and feedback it and apply it to your own career and life. The course will invite models of cultural life aesthetics to share and experience the process of field investigation, leading students to gain insight into cultural life aesthetics during the process and have the opportunity to apply it to their own lives and careers. ※This course will adjust the teaching content or time according to the sharing of role models or field visits. The teaching teacher will make the most appropriate arrangement based on the learning of teachers and students.
